description: This operation retrieves the metadata of an export job. An export job is an operation that transmits the results of a search job to a specified S3 bucket in a .csv file. An export job allows you to retain results of a search beyond the search job's scheduled retention of 7 days.

parameters.name: ExportJobIdentifier
parameters.description: This is the unique string that identifies a specific export job. Required for this operation.

nested_items.name: ExportJobIdentifier
nested_items.description: This is the unique string that identifies the specified export job.

nested_items.name: ExportJobArn
nested_items.description: The unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the export job.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: This is the current status of the export job.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that an export job was created, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CreationTime is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: CompletionTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that an export job completed, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CreationTime is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: A status message is a string that is returned for search job with a status of FAILED, along with steps to remedy and retry the operation.

nested_items.name: ExportSpecification
nested_items.description: The export specification consists of the destination S3 bucket to which the search results were exported, along with the destination prefix.

nested_items.name: s3ExportSpecification
nested_items.description: This specifies the destination Amazon S3 bucket for the export job. And, if included, it also specifies the destination prefix.

nested_items.name: DestinationBucket
nested_items.description: This specifies the destination Amazon S3 bucket for the export job.

nested_items.name: DestinationPrefix
nested_items.description: This specifies the prefix for the destination Amazon S3 bucket for the export job.

nested_items.name: SearchJobArn
nested_items.description: The unique string that identifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified search job.
